tasks.title: Project Foundation Setup
tasks.description: Initialize project structure, development environment, and core infrastructure for the Fuji POS system.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project structure creation, validate environment configuration, test database connectivity, confirm build processes.

subtasks.title: Initialize Git Repository and Project Structure
subtasks.description: Set up version control, create directory structure, initialize package.json, configure .gitignore for Node.js/React project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify git initialization, validate directory structure, test package.json configuration.

subtasks.title: Setup Development Environment Configuration
subtasks.description: Configure ESLint, Prettier, environment variables template, development server configuration, and build tools.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test linting rules, validate code formatting, verify environment variable loading, test development server startup.

subtasks.title: Database Design and Schema Creation
subtasks.description: Design PostgreSQL database schema for menu items, orders, users, daily sales with proper relationships and constraints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate schema structure, test foreign key constraints, verify indexes, test sample data insertion.

subtasks.title: Backend API Framework Setup
subtasks.description: Initialize Express.js server, configure middleware, set up routing structure, database connection, error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test API server startup, validate middleware functionality, test database connection, verify error handling.

tasks.title: User Authentication and Authorization System (Simplified)
tasks.description: Basic user management with simplified role-based access for MVP. Complex authentication removed in favor of streamlined access.
tasks.testStrategy: Test basic authentication, verify simplified role access.

subtasks.title: Basic User Session Management
subtasks.description: Simplified session handling via Supabase auth with minimal role checks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test session persistence, verify basic auth flow.

tasks.title: Menu Management System (MVP Simplified)
tasks.description: Simplified digital menu management with basic fields: name, category, base_price, description. No modifiers or complex pricing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test menu item CRUD operations, validate search functionality, verify category organization.

subtasks.title: Menu Item Database and CRUD Operations
subtasks.description: Simplified menu_items table with basic fields, implement create/read/update/delete endpoints, category management, search functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test CRUD operations, validate data persistence, verify search functionality, test category organization.

subtasks.title: Basic Price Management
subtasks.description: Single base_price field per item. Removed price variations and complex pricing structures.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test price entry and updates, verify price display in order system.

tasks.title: Order Processing System (MVP Simplified)
tasks.description: Streamlined order creation with automatic calculations. Order type (dine-in/take-out), payment method tracking, and immediate completion.
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete order workflow, validate automatic calculations (tax, gratuity), verify order storage.

subtasks.title: Simplified Order Creation
subtasks.description: SimpleOrderForm component: two-panel interface for menu selection and order summary with automatic total calculation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test order creation, validate item selection, verify quantity updates, test calculation accuracy.

subtasks.title: Automatic Order Calculations
subtasks.description: Built-in calculation engine: Subtotal, Tax (8%), Gratuity (20% of subtotal+tax), Total. No manual adjustments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate calculation formulas, test edge cases, verify totals accuracy.

subtasks.title: Order Type and Payment Method Tracking
subtasks.description: Track order_type (dine_in/take_out) and payment_method (cash/credit) for reporting purposes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test order type selection, verify payment method tracking, validate data for reports.

tasks.title: Sales Reporting and Analytics Dashboard
tasks.description: Core reporting system with daily summaries, monthly exports, and grand totals. Replaces complex analytics with focused Excel export functionality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test report generation, validate export formats, verify calculations match requirements.

subtasks.title: Daily Sales Aggregation
subtasks.description: useDailySales hook aggregates orders by date: togo_sales, dine_in_sales, tax_collected, gross_sale, gratuity_total, net_sale, credit_total, cash_deposited.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test daily aggregation accuracy, verify breakdown by order type and payment method.

subtasks.title: Monthly Sales Aggregation
subtasks.description: useMonthlySales hook groups daily sales by month with daily breakdown and monthly totals for all metrics.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test monthly aggregation across all days, validate totals calculation.

subtasks.title: Excel Export Service
subtasks.description: ExportService exports Month_Year_SALES.xlsx (monthly) and Grand_Totals_Sales_Summary.xlsx (all-time) using xlsx library. No $ formatting.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Excel file generation, verify column structure, validate numeric formatting.

subtasks.title: Reports Dashboard UI
subtasks.description: Reports page with three tabs: Daily Summary, Monthly Export, Grand Totals. Clean interface for viewing and exporting data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test tab navigation, verify date selection, test export functionality.

tasks.title: Frontend User Interface (MVP Focused)
tasks.description: Simplified UI with three core pages: Menu Management, New Order, Sales Reports. Touch-optimized components with clean, focused design.
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI responsiveness, validate touch interactions, verify navigation flow.

subtasks.title: Simplified Navigation
subtasks.description: Sidebar with 3 core pages only. Removed dashboard, kitchen, analytics, payments from navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test navigation between pages, verify clean interface.

subtasks.title: Menu Management Interface
subtasks.description: Simple menu CRUD interface with search and category filtering.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test menu management workflow, validate search and filtering.

subtasks.title: Order Entry Interface
subtasks.description: Two-panel SimpleOrderForm: menu selection (left) + order summary (right) with real-time calculations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test order workflow, validate cart functionality, verify calculations display.

subtasks.title: Reports Dashboard Interface
subtasks.description: Three-tab reports page: Daily Summary, Monthly Export, Grand Totals with export buttons.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard functionality, validate export buttons, verify data display.

tasks.title: MVP Implementation and Documentation
tasks.description: Complete MVP pivot implementation with comprehensive documentation suite for deployment and usage.
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation completeness, validate deployment steps, test complete workflow.

subtasks.title: Database Schema Simplification
subtasks.description: Created 006_mvp_simplified_schema.sql migration ensuring core tables exist with simplified structure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test migration execution, verify table structure, validate data persistence.

subtasks.title: Remove Unused Features
subtasks.description: Deleted AI/analytics components, real-time subscriptions, kitchen display from navigation. Archived complex features.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify no build errors, test clean navigation, validate removed features don't appear.

subtasks.title: Documentation Suite
subtasks.description: Created README.md, QUICK_START_MVP.md, DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md, MVP_IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review documentation accuracy, verify deployment steps, validate user guide clarity.

metadata.description: MVP-focused tasks - Cleaned up to reflect simplified sales data automation workflow
